name: Light Hopper (Canyon House Productions, Bravenstein)
description:
Light Hopper

Run through a series of ambient obstacle courses. Race for objectives with friends!  Customize your character with unlockable items hidden throughout  an unexplored dimension.

Light Hopper is a mini-game, which was originally developed for a game jam. We have buffed it up a bit since so that it can be sold to fundraise for our dream game, which is in early development, "El Litelle".
